cardData.title: java
cardData.description: Using Java, fundamental data types to advanced programming structures. You will learn Core Java, Angular JS, Spring MVC.

cardData.title: .Net Full Stack
cardData.description: The .NET Course offered is a comprehensive introduction to the .NET space and .NET coding using C#.

cardData.title: Python programming
cardData.description: Master Python from the inside out and learn how to build any Python program with ease using Python classes and OOP

cardData2.title: Automotive Embedded Software
cardData2.description: An embedded system is a computer system that is designed to perform a specific task within a larger system. In the automotive industry, embedded systems are used to control and monitor various functions of a vehicle. These systems are composed of hardware and software that work together to perform a specific function.

cardData5.title: Artificial Intelligence : Machine Learning and Deep Learning Program
cardData5.description: The course curriculum covers all the concepts to gain real-time proficiency in core essentials of machine learning, machine learning fundamentals, learn about supervised and unsupervised learning, algorithms, support vector machines, etc. Moreover, comprehensive training helps gain expertise in this field to accomplish daily tasks with ease.
